channel.title: Comments on: LED Momentary Buttons & Deutsch Connectors

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2017/02/led-momentary-buttons-deutsch-connectors/#comment-439764">Alex</a>.
A potentiometer definitely would have been easy, I'm not really sure why. I think I just wanted to keep the overall package simple and was fixed on getting the lights to the right static brightness.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Alex.

A potentiometer definitely would have been easy, I’m not really sure why. I think I just wanted to keep the overall package simple and was fixed on getting the lights to the right static brightness.

item.title: By: Alex
item.dc:creator: Alex
item.description: Just stumbled across this build. Quick question, why didn't you use a potentiometer to control the brightness, along with the initial resistor?
item.content:encoded:
Just stumbled across this build.
Quick question, why didn’t you use a potentiometer to control the brightness, along with the initial resistor?
